name: A Long Rest
description:
A Long Rest

Bring peace to your home in this solo adventure!

A Long Rest uses the SRD5 rules. Your familiarity will be assumed, but there are mouseover reminders along the way.  The game will tell you what to do, but you will input certain data from time to time.

You will need:

  • a character sheet for a 1st-level character, such as this one;
  • somewhere to make notes;
  • your creativity.

Some dice will also be helpful.

A Long Rest v 2.1.0.
Written in Harlowe 3.3.1 in Twine.
Inspired by (but absolutely nothing to do with) Seth Jones' The Saint's Tomb.
Play time ~1 hour.
